name: Crunch
description: You control a special forces robot flying from outer space. Your task is to land on a new territory, clean it from enemies, ensure the safety of residents and fly back. You can collect weapons scattered around the territory, repair cars, call for reinforcements. Map and terrain are randomly generated. Each mission has an episode in which you complete a quest. At the end, you will participate in a race in which you must be first to pick up fuel for a jetpack to return home.
